Notes

UK reissue from the period 1977-1979. Similar release version to [r13829152] except for the absence of the ▽E pattern in the runout matrix, denoting this to be an earlier Phonodisc pressing. White inner sleeve denotes March 1978 as release date. Mad Hatter logo on gatefold inside. The previous edition came with a [url=https://www.discogs.com/Genesis-Trespass/release/6849190]Charisma Scroll logo[/url] instead. Includes one-sided lyric sheet. Gatefold inside: Recorded at Trident Studios, London. Mad Hatter logo Phonogram logo Marketed by Charisma Records Ltd., 90 Wardour St., London W1. Manufactured and Distributed by Phonogram Ltd. Printed by Howards Printers (Slough) Ltd. England. Labels: ℗ 1970 Stratsong/Carlin Marketed and distributed by Phonogram Ltd Lacquer Cut and Pressing credits derived from runout matrix.
